tileset.desc: The tileset from the Action Rpg Kit - Stand Alone.
tileset.name: Action RPG

custom-block.gui: add node ( x: %1 y: %2 ) to path for %0
custom-block.name: AddNode

custom-block.gui: add node ( x: %1 y: %2 ) with speed %3 to path for %0
custom-block.name: AddNodeWithCustomSpeed

custom-block.desc: Subtracts a specific amount of health from the Actor.
custom-block.name: Damage

custom-block.gui: make %0 spawn the enemies defined in %1
custom-block.name: execute_wave

custom-block.gui: find target with fewest hp in range
custom-block.name: find_least_hp

custom-block.gui: find target with fewest max hp in range
custom-block.name: find_least_max_hp

custom-block.gui: find target with most max hp in range
custom-block.name: find_most_max_hp

custom-block.gui: find target with most hp in range
custom-block.name: find_target_most_hp

custom-block.gui: make %0 flicker %1 times for %2 seconds when %3 happens
custom-block.name: flicker_event

custom-block.desc: Get the font used. Use for if you are setting up labels to retain consistency across Flash and other platforms.
custom-block.name: GetFont

custom-block.desc: Adds a specific amount of health to the Actor.
custom-block.name: Heal

custom-block.gui: increase score by %1 when %0 is killed
custom-block.name: increase_score_by_points

custom-block.gui: Set Score Drawing Offset to X %0 Y %1
custom-block.name: SetDrawOffset

custom-block.desc: Shoot at the specified target and deal a certain amount of damage
custom-block.name: shoot_target
